Hugh Jackman as Charlie Kenton

I think it deserves a higher score.
hmm, probably why I've never heard of it
what's the story plot
it has the same origins of terminator. Robots fighting
It's an action/thriller
Read the introduction. Based on that would you want to watch it?
I don't see the document
You're supposed to convince me to watch it :)
yes action/thriller

Real Steel is a 2011 American science fiction sports film starring Hugh Jackman and Dakota Goyo
and co-produced and directed by Shawn Levy for DreamWorks Pictures. The film is based on the
short story "Steel", written by Richard Matheson, which was originally published in the May 1956
edition of The Magazine of Fantasy & Science Fiction, and later adapted into a 1963 Twilight Zone
episode. Real Steel was in development for several years before production began on June 24,
2010. Filming took place primarily in the U.S. state of Michigan. Animatronic robots were built for
the film, and motion capture technology was used to depict the brawling of computer-generated
Ok, is there a back story or anything?
Sounds like that Will Smith movie, iRobot
yeah, its a movie based in the future. Human fighters no longer fight so they use robots to fight.
What are they fighting for?
It does have some similar aspects of Irobot but this it isnt trying to show that robots are taking over.
So they're just human ammunition !
The usual reason anyone fights for, ego, dominance and pride.
Do the humans learn a lesson in the end, or how does it end?
THere is also a tidal or throphy that they want to recieve with a money prize
Oh, money!
Power
I believe the best fighter/robot is purchased or stolen by the antagonist and they returns to the origanal owner.
Its been a long time since ive seen it.
based on what ive told you would you want to watch it?
